com.compendium.ui.menus
Class UIMenuHelp

java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.ui.menus.UIMenu
      com.compendium.ui.menus.UIMenuHelp
All Implemented Interfaces:
IUIMenu, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
public class UIMenuHelp
extends UIMenu
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener

This class creates and manages the Help menu.

Author:
Michelle Bachler
